data.title: I am Ghost Producer Blog
data.meta_description: In this article, We will tell you about Deadmau5. About Family, Music Career, Popularity, Famous Tracks, Thoughts about Ghost Producers etc
data.text:
In the world of electronic music, few artists have had as much of an impact as deadmau5. For more than a decade, this Canadian producer and DJ has been pushing the boundaries of what is possible with sound, creating a unique and instantly recognizable style that has inspired a generation of producers. While deadmau5 may be best known for his club-friendly hits, he has also gained a reputation as a visionary producer, capable of creating complex and emotive soundscapes.

About Deadmau5

Where Was Deadmau5 Born?

Deadmau5 was born in Niagara Falls, Ontario, Canada.

Who is Deadmau5?

He is a famous electronic dance music (EDM) producer and DJ, known for his distinctive mouse head helmet and his progressive house and techno music.

How old is Deadmau5?

Deadmau5 is 42 years old as of today’s date.

Where Deadmau5 Lives

Currently, Deadmau5 lives in Campbellville, Ontario, Canada. He bought a 14,000-square-foot mansion there in 2014 for $5 million. The house has six bedrooms, seven bathrooms, a home theater, a wine cellar, a gym, a pool, and a three-car garage. He also has a studio where he produces his music and streams his shows. He used to live in Toronto, but he moved to Campbellville for more privacy and space.

What’s Deadmau5’s Real Name?

His real name is Joel Thomas Zimmerman.

Deadmau5’s Family

Who is Deadmau5’s Wife?

Deadmau5’s wife is Kelly Zimmerman, formerly Kelly Fedoni. She is a real estate saleswoman and a former model.

How Deadmau5 Met His Wife?

It’s believed that Deadmau5 met his ex-wife, Kelly Fedoni sometime in 2015 or 2016. He proposed to her secretly while they were vacationing in the Maldives with friends in January 2016. He shared a picture of her wearing an engagement ring on his Facebook page.

When did Deadmau5 get married?

They got married on August 12, 2017, after getting engaged in January 2016. However, in June 2021, Deadmau5 announced that they were legally separating after nearly four years of marriage. He said that their decision was amicable and that they still had a love for each other.

Deadmau5’s Children

Deadmau5 is a father to a daughter named Zoe from a previous relationship. Information on whether they have children with Kelly is unclear although there are rumors that they got a son by the name Otis who was reportedly born in November 2020.

Starting the Music Career

When did Deadmau5 start DJing?

Deadmau5, whose real name is Joel Zimmerman, started DJing in the late 1990s when he was in his late teens. He began by playing at small clubs and parties in and around his hometown of Toronto, Canada.

How did Deadmau5 get his stage name?

Deadmau5 got his stage name from a rather unusual source. According to an interview with Mixmag, he was working in a computer repair shop when he found a dead mouse inside a computer. He took a picture of the dead mouse and posted it on an online forum, where he was known by the username “Dead Mouse.”

However, he soon discovered that the forum’s software had a character limit for usernames, so he had to come up with a new name. He decided to shorten “Dead Mouse” to “Deadmau5,” using a number in place of the “s” to meet the character limit. The name stuck, and he started using it as his stage name when he began performing as a DJ.

When Deadmau5 became famous?

It was in 2008 when he released his third studio album, Random Album Title he gained great me. The album was certified gold in Canada and silver in the United Kingdom, and featured the hit singles “Faxing Berlin”, “Not Exactly”, and “I Remember”. The album also helped establish his signature progressive house and electro-house sound and earned him his first Juno Award for dance recording of the year. He also gained recognition for his live performances, wearing a mouse head helmet and using a custom-made touch screen device called the “mau5head”.

After the purchase you receive all the files & documents to own 100% of rights on it. The song(s) will be fully yours and You will be able to sign, release, publish and play it everywhere where you want under your own name (alias, pseudonim).

Maybe Your purchased track(s) become hit and You become famous like your idols. Don’t hesitate – Go to the shop.

Is Deadmau5 the Best DJ?

Though this Canadian is undoubtedly a highly influential and successful DJ/producer who has made significant contributions to the electronic music industry, and many people consider him to be one of the best in the world. However, the concept of who is the “best” DJ is often a matter of opinion and open to debate.

The Popularity of Deadmau5

Why is Deadmau5 so popular?

He has been active in the electronic music scene for over two decades and has consistently produced high-quality tracks that have resonated with fans of various genres within the electronic music spectrum. Again, he’s known for his iconic “mau5head” mask, which has become an instantly recognizable symbol of his brand. His live shows are highly energetic and entertaining, with stunning visuals and impressive production values that create a truly immersive experience for fans.

What is Deadmau5’s most famous song?

Funny enough, most of his songs are popular among various music lovers. Among his most popular and recognizable tracks is “Strobe.” Released in 2009, “Strobe” quickly became a fan favorite and has since become an electronic music classic. “Strobe” has been played at festivals and shows around the world and remains one of Deadmau5’s most beloved tracks to this day.

Deadmau5 and Music Production

What does Deadmau5 use to make music?

He is known to use a digital audio workstation (DAW) software as well as various plugins and virtual instruments to create his unique sound. Some of the hardware tools that he uses include synthesizers such as the Access Virus TI and the Roland SH-101, as well as controllers like the Novation Launchpad and the Ableton Push. Deadmau5 is also known for his modular synth setups, which allow him to create complex and unique sounds that cannot be easily replicated with software alone.

What DAW (Software) does Deadmau5 Use?

The popular producer and DJ uses Ableton Live as his primary Digital Audio Workstation software. He also uses other DAWs such as Apple Logic Pro, Image Line FL Studio, Steinberg Cubase, Bitwig Studio, and Avid Pro Tools in some of his project.

In what styles of music does Deadmau5 make tracks?

Deadmau5’s music is primarily classified as electronic dance music (EDM), specifically in the sub-genres of progressive house, techno, and electro-house. He is known for his atmospheric and intricate soundscapes, and his tracks often feature intricate melodies and complex rhythms. While his music is primarily dance-oriented, Deadmau5 has also experimented with ambient and experimental styles, as well as incorporating elements of rock and classical music into his productions.

Deadmau5 Gigs, Shows, and Festivals

Where is Deadmau5 playing?

Deadmau5 is a Canadian electronic music producer and DJ who is known for his distinctive mouse head helmet and progressive house tracks. He is currently touring across the US and France and has multiple upcoming shows. His next tour date is at L’Olympia in Paris on July 8, which is his only show in France. You can find more information about his shows on his official website or other reputable ticketing platforms.

How much does Deadmau5 charge per show?

According to a tweet from Deadmau5 himself in 2016, he was making roughly $400,000 to $1,000,000 per show. This may vary depending on the venue, the location, the demand, and other factors. In 2014, his booking fee was estimated to be $200,000 to $250,000. You can check his availability and pricing for private or corporate events on some booking websites, but be prepared to pay a hefty sum for his performance.

What Does Deadmau5 think about Ghost Production and Ghost Producers?

The ‘Dead Mouse Guy’ has been vocal about his dislike of ghost production and has criticized some artists for using it. He once tweeted, “Ghost production is a cancer to the industry. It’s not a team effort.”

Final Thoughts

Deadmau5 is no stranger to pushing the boundaries of EDM and creating something entirely new. He often incorporates elements of rock, jazz, and classical music into his productions to create unique soundscapes. His live performances are known for their complex set-ups, featuring multiple modular synths in addition to traditional instruments. He has explored the limits of technology which has helped to define the genre of EDM and paved the way for other artists to follow in his footsteps.
